title: kanna thalli naapai
sahitya:
kanna talli nApai karuNincavE
annapUraNi yanu rAgavardhini 

anupallavi

enna rANi nEramulanu mannimpa
vinnavincinagA vInu sOka leyadA 

caraNam

nEmamulu nitya karmamulErugani
pAmaruDanucu parAku sEyaka
sAmagAnOdbhava sangItamuneruga
nAmakIrtana mArgamosagi nannu
